sentences.en: "What am I doing wrong, anyway?" — "Beats me, Lewis."
sentences.cn: “不管怎样，我到底做错了什么？”——“这我也不知道，刘易斯。”

sentences.en: Carl Lewis has broken the world record in the 100 metres.
sentences.cn: 卡尔·刘易斯已经打破了百米赛跑的世界纪录。

sentences.en: General Lewis Hyde had served under General "Billy" Mitchell.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯·海德将军曾是“比利”·米切尔将军的部下。

sentences.en: I can't forgive Lewis for robbing me of an Olympic gold.
sentences.cn: 我不能原谅刘易斯夺走了我一块奥运会金牌。

sentences.en: I hate Lewis and his kind just as much as you do.
sentences.cn: 我和你一样痛恨刘易斯之流。

sentences.en: Later in the evening, Lewis began to croon another Springsteen song.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上晚些时候，刘易斯开始哼唱另一首斯普林斯汀的歌曲。

sentences.en: Lewis desperately needs to keep clear of Ruddock's big left hook.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯无论如何得躲开拉多克凌厉的左钩拳才行。

sentences.en: Lewis emerges as a composer of distinction and sensitivity.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯作为一位悟性很高的优秀作曲家崭露头角。

sentences.en: Lewis has grown philosophical about life.
sentences.cn: 对于生活，刘易斯变得豁达洒脱了。

sentences.en: Lewis is matched against the WBO's heavyweight champion, Tommy Morrison.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯对决世界拳击组织的重量级拳王汤米·莫里森。

sentences.en: Lewis is the author of thirteen novels and ten non-fiction books.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯写了13本小说和10本纪实文学作品。

sentences.en: Lewis was not in the right frame of mind to continue.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯当时的心情不适合继续下去。

sentences.en: Mr. Lewis takes an insufferably glib attitude toward it all.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯先生对这一切不以为意，令人厌恶。

sentences.en: This morning, looking harassed and drawn, Lewis tendered his resignation.
sentences.cn: 今天早晨，刘易斯面色憔悴、疲惫不堪地递交了辞呈。

sentences.en: Within hours, police corralled the three men Lewis had named.
sentences.cn: 几小时之内，警察就抓到了刘易斯提到的那三个人。

phrases.tran_cn: 卡尔刘易斯（美国田径名将）
刘易斯·汉密尔顿（英国一级方程式赛车手）
拉沙德刘易斯（篮球运动员）

trans.tran_cn: 吊楔，(L-)路易斯（男子名，涵义：在战场上很有名气）
trans.tran_en: a lifting device for heavy stone or concrete blocks consisting of a number of curved pieces of metal or wedges fitting into a dovetailed recess cut into the block
